title: How Jared Kushner Lost at the World Cup in Qatar
description:
Fans from across the Arab world demonstrated support for the Palestinians and disdain for Israelis, showing how little Kushner achieved as a peacemaker.

The post How Jared Kushner Lost at the World Cup in Qatar appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Barry Jones Is Spending Another Holiday Season on Death Row. Could It Be His Last?
description:
At an upcoming settlement conference in federal court, lawyers for Jones will try to negotiate an end to his long legal saga.

The post Barry Jones Is Spending Another Holiday Season on Death Row. Could It Be His Last? appeared first on The Intercept.
